trans-unit.source: Represents the navigation and manipulation user interface (UI) for controls on a form that are bound to data.
trans-unit.target: Representa interface do usuário de navegação e a manipulação para controles em um formulário que está associado aos dados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control represents a standardized way to navigate and manipulate data on a form.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> controle representa uma maneira padronizada para navegar e manipular dados em um formulário.

trans-unit.source: In most cases, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> is paired with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> control to move through data records on a form and interact with them.
trans-unit.target: Na maioria dos casos, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> é emparelhado com um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> controle para percorrer os registros de dados em um formulário e interagir com eles.

trans-unit.source: In these cases, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property is set to the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource?displayProperty=nameWithType> component that acts as a data source.
trans-unit.target: Nesses casos, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> está definida para associado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource?displayProperty=nameWithType> componente que atua como uma fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control's user interface (UI) is composed of a series of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> buttons, text boxes, and static text elements for most common data-related actions, such as adding data, deleting data, and navigating through data.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> (interface do usuário) do controle é composto de uma série de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> botões, caixas de texto e elementos de texto estático para ações relacionadas a dados mais comuns, como adicionar dados, a exclusão de dados e navegar por dados.

trans-unit.source: Each of these controls can be retrieved or set through an associated member of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control.
trans-unit.target: Cada um desses controles pode ser recuperada ou definida por meio de um membro associado do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> controle.

trans-unit.source: Likewise, there is also a one-to-one correspondence to members within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> class that programmatically perform the same functionality, as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, também há uma correspondência aos membros dentro de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> classe que executar programaticamente a mesma funcionalidade, conforme mostrado na tabela a seguir.

trans-unit.source: UI Control
trans-unit.target: Controle de interface do usuário

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> member
trans-unit.target: Membro do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> member
trans-unit.target: Membro do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: **Move First**
trans-unit.target: **Mover primeiro**

trans-unit.source: **Move Previous**
trans-unit.target: **Mover anterior**

trans-unit.source: **Current Position**
trans-unit.target: **Posição atual**

trans-unit.source: **Count**
trans-unit.target: **Contagem**

trans-unit.source: **Move Next**
trans-unit.target: **Mover próximo**

trans-unit.source: **Move Last**
trans-unit.target: **Mover último**

trans-unit.source: **Add New**
trans-unit.target: **Adicionar novo**

trans-unit.source: **Delete**
trans-unit.target: **Excluir**

trans-unit.source: Adding a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control to a form and binding it to a data source, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>, will automatically establish the relationships in this table.
trans-unit.target: Adicionando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> controle a um formulário e vinculá-la a uma fonte de dados, como um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>, estabelecerá automaticamente relações nesta tabela.

trans-unit.source: You can use one of the following techniques to customize this toolbar:
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar uma das seguintes técnicas para personalizar esta barra de ferramentas:

trans-unit.source: Create the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29> constructor, which accepts a Boolean `addStandardItems` parameter, and set this parameter to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Criar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29> construtor, que aceita um valor booleano `addStandardItems` parâmetro e defina esse parâmetro `false`.

trans-unit.source: Then add the desired <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, adicione o desejado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> objetos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> coleção.

trans-unit.source: If a great deal of customization is desired, or the custom design will be reused, derive a class from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> and override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> method to define additional or alternate standard items.
trans-unit.target: Se uma grande quantidade de personalização é desejada ou design personalizado será reutilizado, derive uma classe de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> e substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> método para definir itens padrão alternativos.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control to move through a data set.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> controle para percorrer um conjunto de dados.

trans-unit.source: The set is contained in a <xref:System.Data.DataView>, which is bound to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component.
trans-unit.target: O conjunto é contido em um <xref:System.Data.DataView>, que está associada a um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controlar com um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> componente.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator" />.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Os conjuntos de construtor padrão de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> propriedade `null`.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29> constructor with a parameter value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor é equivalente a chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29> construtor com um valor de parâmetro `false`.

trans-unit.source: You can add the standard items by making a separate call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar os itens padrão, fazendo uma chamada separada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to show the standard navigational UI; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para mostrar a interface do usuário de navegação padrão, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator" /> class, indicating whether to display the standard navigation user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator" />, indicando se deve exibir a interface do usuário de navegação padrão.

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Esse construtor define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> propriedade `null`.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> is `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddNewItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveFirstItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveLastItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MovePreviousItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.DeleteItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A> will also be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> é `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddNewItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveFirstItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveLastItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MovePreviousItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.DeleteItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A> também será `null`.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" /> to add the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator" /> control to.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" /> ao qual adicionar o novo controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator" /> class and adds this new instance to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator" /> e adiciona esta nova instância ao contêiner especificado.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is provided as a convenience, combining the steps of creating a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control and adding it to a parent <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor é fornecido como uma conveniência, combinando as etapas de criação de um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> controle e adicioná-lo a um pai <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.

trans-unit.source: Like the default constructor, it sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property to `null` and does not show the standard user interface.
trans-unit.target: Como o construtor padrão, ele define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> propriedade `null` e não mostrar a interface de usuário padrão.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> used as a data source.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> usado como uma fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> as the data source.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator" /> com o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> especificado como a fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the `BindingSource` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor usa o `BindingSource` parâmetro para inicializar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: It also adds the standard set of navigational buttons and sets their corresponding properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Ele também adiciona o conjunto padrão de botões de navegação e define suas propriedades correspondentes, como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> that represents the **Add New** button.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> que representa o botão **Adicionar Novo**.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> that represents the **Add New** button for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> que representa o botão **Adicionar Novo** do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: When set, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddNewItem%2A> property generates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event handler for the **Add New** button.
trans-unit.target: Quando definido, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddNewItem%2A> propriedade gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> manipulador de eventos para o **adicionar novo** botão.

trans-unit.source: This event handler calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A> method when the **Add New** button is clicked at run time.
trans-unit.target: Este manipulador de eventos chama o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A> método quando o **adicionar novo** botão é clicado em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: This property is `null` if it was not previously set and it is accessed before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> method is implicitly or explicitly called.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é `null` se não foi definido anteriormente e que são acessadas antes do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> método é chamado de forma implícita ou explícita.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control will disable the **Add New** button if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property is `null` or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> irá desabilitar o controle de **adicionar novo** botão se a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> é de propriedade `null` ou o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A> é de propriedade `false`.

trans-unit.source: In the default implementation, this property represents a control of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.
trans-unit.target: Na implementação do padrão, esta propriedade representa um controle do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.

trans-unit.source: Adds the standard set of navigation items to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o conjunto padrão de itens de navegação ao controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> method adds the standard set of user interface <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> tool strip for basic navigation operations, such as **Move First**, **Move Last**, and **Add New**.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> método adiciona o conjunto padrão de interface do usuário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> objetos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> ferramenta faixa para operações de navegação básica, como **mover primeiro**, **Mover último**, e **adicionar novo**.

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> in derived classes to define additional or alternative tool strip items.
trans-unit.target: Substituir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> em classes para definir itens de faixa de ferramenta alternativo ou adicionais derivadas.

trans-unit.source: To ensure optimal design-time support for your derived class, make sure each item has a meaningful value in its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para garantir o melhor suporte de tempo de design para sua classe derivada, certifique-se de cada item tem um valor significativo seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Name%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: At design time, this will be used to generate a unique name for the corresponding member variable.
trans-unit.target: Em tempo de design, isso será usado para gerar um nome exclusivo para a variável de membro correspondente.

trans-unit.source: The item's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Name%2A> property will then be updated to match the name given to the member variable.
trans-unit.target: O item <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Name%2A> propriedade será atualizada para corresponder ao nome fornecido para a variável de membro.

trans-unit.source: This method does not explicitly remove any previously existing items from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>, but does set new values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MovePreviousItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveFirstItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveLastItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddNewItem%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.DeleteItem%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Esse método não remove todos os itens existentes de explicitamente o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>, mas definir novos valores para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MovePreviousItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveFirstItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveLastItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddNewItem%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.DeleteItem%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Also <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> does not suspend layout while items are being added.
trans-unit.target: Também <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> não suspende layout enquanto estiver sendo adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Disables updates to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> controls of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator" /> during the component's initialization.
trans-unit.target: Desabilita as atualizações para os controles <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator" /> durante a inicialização do componente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.EndInit%2A> methods allow the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control to optimize changes to multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BeginInit%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.EndInit%2A> métodos permitem o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> controle para otimizar as alterações para várias propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Using this pair of methods, you can initialize co-dependent properties or batch set multiple properties at design time.
trans-unit.target: Usando esse par de métodos, você pode inicializar propriedades dependentes colegas ou lote configurar múltiplas propriedades em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BeginInit%2A> method to signal the control that initialization is starting; call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.EndInit%2A> method to signal that initialization is complete.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BeginInit%2A> método para sinalizar o controle que a inicialização está sendo iniciado; a chamada a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.EndInit%2A> método para sinalizar que a inicialização for concluído.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> component that is the source of data.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o define o componente <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> que é a fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> component associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator" />.
trans-unit.target: O componente <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> associado a esse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property represents the data source that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> navigates through.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> propriedade representa os dados de origem que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> navega pelo.

trans-unit.source: More specifically, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> represents the actual data list.
trans-unit.target: Mais especificamente, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> representa a lista de dados reais.

trans-unit.source: This is the default property for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> class.
trans-unit.target: Essa é a propriedade padrão para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> classe.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control to move through a data set.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> controle para percorrer um conjunto de dados.

trans-unit.source: The set is contained in a <xref:System.Data.DataView>, which is bound to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component.
trans-unit.target: O conjunto é contido em um <xref:System.Data.DataView>, que está associada a um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controlar com um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> componente.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Move Through a DataSet with the Windows Forms BindingNavigator Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/move-through-a-dataset-with-wf-bindingnavigator-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido em [como: mover por meio de um conjunto de dados com o controle BindingNavigator dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/move-through-a-dataset-with-wf-bindingnavigator-control.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> that displays the total number of items in the associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> que exibe o número total de itens no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> associado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> that displays the total number of items in the associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> que exibe o número total de itens no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A> property is `null` if it was not previously set and it is accessed before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> method is implicitly or explicitly called.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A> é de propriedade `null` se não foi definido anteriormente e que são acessadas antes do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> método é chamado de forma implícita ou explícita.

trans-unit.source: The count of items is accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.
trans-unit.target: A contagem de itens é acessada por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.

trans-unit.source: In the default implementation, this property represents a control of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Na implementação do padrão, esta propriedade representa um controle do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string used to format the information displayed in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma cadeia de caracteres usada para formatar as informações exibidas no controle <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem" />.

trans-unit.source: The format <see cref="T:System.String" /> used to format the item count.
trans-unit.target: O formato <see cref="T:System.String" /> usada para formatar a contagem de itens.

trans-unit.source: The default is the string "of {0}".
trans-unit.target: O padrão é a cadeia de caracteres "de {0}".

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A> control is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> that displays the total number of items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A> controle é um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> que exibe o número total de itens no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItemFormat%2A> property is the format string used to format the count.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItemFormat%2A> propriedade é a cadeia de caracteres de formato usada para formatar a contagem.

trans-unit.source: For more information about format strings, see the <xref:System.String.Format%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre cadeias de caracteres de formato, consulte o <xref:System.String.Format%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> that is associated with the **Delete** functionality.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> que está associado à funcionalidade **Excluir**.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> that represents the **Delete** button for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> que representa o botão **Excluir** do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" />.

trans-unit.source: When set, this property generates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event handler for the **Delete** button.
trans-unit.target: Quando definido, essa propriedade gerará o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> manipulador de eventos para o **excluir** botão.

trans-unit.source: This event handler calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveCurrent%2A> method when the **Delete** button is clicked at run time.
trans-unit.target: Este manipulador de eventos chama o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveCurrent%2A> método quando o **excluir** botão é clicado em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: This property is `null` if it was not previously set and it is accessed before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> method is implicitly or explicitly called.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é `null` se não foi definido anteriormente e que são acessadas antes do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> método é chamado de forma implícita ou explícita.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control will disable the **Delete** button under the following run-time circumstances: the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property is `null`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> property is 0, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowRemove%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> irá desabilitar o controle de **excluir** botão nas seguintes circunstâncias de tempo de execução: o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> é de propriedade `null`, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> propriedade é 0, ou o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowRemove%2A> é de propriedade `false`.

trans-unit.source: In the default implementation, this property represents a control of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.
trans-unit.target: Na implementação do padrão, esta propriedade representa um controle do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator" /> e opcionalmente libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo método público `Dispose` e pelo método <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` invoca o método `Dispose(Boolean)` protegido com o parâmetro `disposing` definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro for true, este método libera todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> referências.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o método `Dispose()` de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> pode ser chamado várias vezes por outros objetos.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> cuidado para não fazer referência a objetos que têm foi descartados anteriormente em uma chamada anterior para <see langword="Dispose" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como implementar <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, consulte [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre <see langword="Dispose" /> e <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [substituindo o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Enables updates to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> controls of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator" /> after the component's initialization has concluded.
trans-unit.target: Habilita atualizações para os controles <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator" /> após a inicialização do componente ter sido concluída.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.EndInit%2A> methods allow the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control to optimize changes to multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BeginInit%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.EndInit%2A> métodos permitem o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> controle para otimizar as alterações para várias propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Using this pair of methods, you can initialize co-dependent properties or batch set multiple properties at design time.
trans-unit.target: Usando esse par de métodos, você pode inicializar propriedades dependentes colegas ou lote configurar múltiplas propriedades em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BeginInit%2A> method to signal the control that initialization is starting; call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.EndInit%2A> method to signal that initialization is complete.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BeginInit%2A> método para sinalizar o controle que a inicialização está sendo iniciado; a chamada a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.EndInit%2A> método para sinalizar que a inicialização for concluído.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> that is associated with the **Move First** functionality.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> associado à funcionalidade **Mover Primeiro**.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> that represents the **Move First** button for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> que representa o botão **Mover Primeiro** do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" />.

trans-unit.source: When set, this property generates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event handler for the **Move First** button.
trans-unit.target: Quando definido, essa propriedade gerará o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> manipulador de eventos para o **mover primeiro** botão.

trans-unit.source: This event handler calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveFirst%2A> method when the **Move First** button is clicked at run time.
trans-unit.target: Este manipulador de eventos chama o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveFirst%2A> método quando o **mover primeiro** botão é clicado em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: This property is `null` if it was not previously set and it is accessed before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> method is implicitly or explicitly called.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é `null` se não foi definido anteriormente e que são acessadas antes do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> método é chamado de forma implícita ou explícita.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control will disable the **Move First** button under the following run-time circumstances: the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property is `null`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is zero, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A> for the related <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> irá desabilitar o controle de **mover primeiro** botão nas seguintes circunstâncias de tempo de execução: o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> é de propriedade `null`, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade é zero, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A> para relacionado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> é `false`.

trans-unit.source: In the default implementation, this property represents a control of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.
trans-unit.target: Na implementação do padrão, esta propriedade representa um controle do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> that is associated with the **Move Last** functionality.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> que está associado à funcionalidade **Mover Último**.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> that represents the **Move Last** button for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> que representa o botão **Mover Último** do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" />.

trans-unit.source: When set, this property generates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event handler for the **Move Last** button.
trans-unit.target: Quando definido, essa propriedade gerará o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> manipulador de eventos para o **Mover último** botão.

trans-unit.source: This event handler calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveLast%2A> method when the **Move Last** button is clicked at run time.
trans-unit.target: Este manipulador de eventos chama o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveLast%2A> método quando o **Mover último** botão é clicado em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: This property is `null` if it was not previously set and it is accessed before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> method is implicitly or explicitly called.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é `null` se não foi definido anteriormente e que são acessadas antes do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> método é chamado de forma implícita ou explícita.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control will disable the **Move Last** button under the following run-time circumstances: the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property is `null` or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> property is greater than or equal to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> irá desabilitar o controle de **Mover último** botão nas seguintes circunstâncias de tempo de execução: o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> é de propriedade `null` ou o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> propriedade é maior que ou igual ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: In the default implementation, this property represents a control of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.
trans-unit.target: Na implementação do padrão, esta propriedade representa um controle do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> that is associated with the **Move Next** functionality.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> associado à funcionalidade **Mover Próximo**.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> that represents the **Move Next** button for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> que representa o botão **Mover Próximo** do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" />.

trans-unit.source: When set, this property generates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event handler for the **Move Next** button.
trans-unit.target: Quando definido, essa propriedade gerará o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> manipulador de eventos para o **mover próximo** botão.

trans-unit.source: This event handler calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveNext%2A> method when the **Move Next** button is clicked at run time.
trans-unit.target: Este manipulador de eventos chama o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveNext%2A> método quando o **mover próximo** botão é clicado em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: This property is `null` if it was not previously set and it is accessed before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> method is implicitly or explicitly called.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é `null` se não foi definido anteriormente e que são acessadas antes do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> método é chamado de forma implícita ou explícita.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control will disable the **Move Next** button under the following run-time circumstances: the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property is `null` or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> property is greater than or equal to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> irá desabilitar o controle de **mover próximo** botão nas seguintes circunstâncias de tempo de execução: o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> é de propriedade `null` ou o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> propriedade é maior que ou igual ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: In the default implementation, this property represents a control of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.
trans-unit.target: Na implementação do padrão, esta propriedade representa um controle do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> that is associated with the **Move Previous** functionality.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> associado à funcionalidade **Mover Anterior**.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> that represents the **Move Previous** button for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> que representa o **mover anterior** botão para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" />.

trans-unit.source: When set, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MovePreviousItem%2A> property generates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event handler for the **Move Previous** button.
trans-unit.target: Quando definido, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MovePreviousItem%2A> propriedade gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> manipulador de eventos para o **mover anterior** botão.

trans-unit.source: This event handler calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MovePrevious%2A> method when the **Move Previous** button is clicked at run time.
trans-unit.target: Este manipulador de eventos chama o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MovePrevious%2A> método quando o **mover anterior** botão é clicado em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: This property is `null` if it was not previously set and it is accessed before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> method is implicitly or explicitly called.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é `null` se não foi definido anteriormente e que são acessadas antes do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> método é chamado de forma implícita ou explícita.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control will disable the **Move Previous** button under the following run-time circumstances: the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property is `null` or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> property is less than or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> irá desabilitar o controle de **mover anterior** botão nas seguintes circunstâncias de tempo de execução: o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> é de propriedade `null` ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> propriedade é menor ou igual a 0.

trans-unit.source: In the default implementation, this property represents a control of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.
trans-unit.target: Na implementação do padrão, esta propriedade representa um controle do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.RefreshItems" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.RefreshItems" />.

trans-unit.source: In addition to raising the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.RefreshItems> event, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.OnRefreshItems%2A> method performs the following operations against the state of the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.
trans-unit.target: Além de gerar correspondente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.RefreshItems> evento, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.OnRefreshItems%2A> método executa as seguintes operações em relação o estado dos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the internal members using the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> state.
trans-unit.target: Define os membros internos usando atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> estado.

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables user interface (UI) items appropriately for the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> state.
trans-unit.target: Habilita ou desabilita os itens de interface do usuário do usuário adequadamente para atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> estado.

trans-unit.source: Updates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A> controls.
trans-unit.target: Atualizações de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A> controles.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.OnRefreshItems%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.OnRefreshItems%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.OnRefreshItems" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.OnRefreshItems" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.OnRefreshItems" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.OnRefreshItems" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> that displays the current position within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> que exibe a posição atual dentro do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> that displays the current position.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> que exibe a posição atual.

trans-unit.source: In the default implementation, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A> property is of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Na implementação do padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A> é de propriedade do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>.

trans-unit.source: This property is `null` if it was not previously set and it is accessed before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> method is implicitly or explicitly called.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é `null` se não foi definido anteriormente e que são acessadas antes do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> método é chamado de forma implícita ou explícita.

trans-unit.source: The current position calculated by obtaining the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>, and adding 1 to transform the position into a 1-based count.
trans-unit.target: A posição atual calculada obtendo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>e adição de 1 para transformar a posição em uma contagem de base 1.

trans-unit.source: In the default implementation, this property represents a control of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Na implementação do padrão, esta propriedade representa um controle do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the state of the navigational user interface (UI) needs to be refreshed to reflect the current state of the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o estado da interface do usuário de navegação precisa ser atualizado para refletir o estado atual dos dados subjacentes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.RefreshItems?displayProperty=nameWithType> event signals that the navigational UI of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> needs to be updated to reflect the current state of the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.RefreshItems?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento sinaliza que a interface de usuário de navegação do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> precisa ser atualizado para refletir o estado atual do associado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.

trans-unit.source: This is the default event for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> class.
trans-unit.target: Trata-se do evento padrão para a classe <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.RefreshItems> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.RefreshItems> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar relatórios sobre vários eventos ou eventos que ocorrem com frequência, considere substituir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> com <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou anexar a mensagem como um multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> named `BindingNavigator1`.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> chamado `BindingNavigator1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.RefreshItems> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.RefreshItems> evento.

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the state of the standard items to reflect the current state of the data.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza o estado dos itens padrão para refletir o estado atual dos dados.

trans-unit.source: If you have overridden <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> in a derived class, you should also override <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.RefreshItemsCore%2A> to refresh any custom standard items you have added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control.
trans-unit.target: Se você tiver substituído <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> em uma classe derivada, você também deve substituir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.RefreshItemsCore%2A> para atualizar qualquer itens padrão personalizados que você adicionou ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> controle.

trans-unit.source: Causes form validation to occur and returns whether validation was successful.
trans-unit.target: Faz com que ocorra a validação do formulário e retorna se a validação foi bem-sucedida.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if validation was successful and focus can shift to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a validação tiver sido bem-sucedida e o foco puder mudar para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator" />, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to confirm focus can shift before performing the click action for an item on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para confirmar antes de executar a ação de clique de um item no foco pode alternar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> controle.
